sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import {
  Container,
  Typography,
  Box,
  Button,
  Paper,
  AppBar,
  Toolbar,
  Stack,
  Divider
} from '@mui/material';
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';
import {
  Search as SearchIcon,
  PersonAdd as PersonAddIcon,
  Chat as ChatIcon,
  Handshake as HandshakeIcon,
  ArrowBack as ArrowBackIcon
} from '@mui/icons-material';

const GradientHeader = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({
  background: `linear-gradient(135deg, ${theme.palette.primary.main} 0%, ${theme.palette.secondary.main} 100%)`,
  color: theme.palette.primary.contrastText,
  padding: theme.spacing(6, 0),
  marginBottom: theme.spacing(6),
}));

const StepIcon = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({
  display: 'flex',
  alignItems: 'center',
  justifyContent: 'center',
  width: 60,
  height: 60,
  borderRadius: '50%',
  backgroundColor: theme.palette.primary.main,
  color: theme.palette.primary.contrastText,
  marginBottom: theme.spacing(2),
}));

const HowItWorks: React.FC = () => {
  const steps = [
    {
      label: 'Create Your Profile',
      icon: <PersonAddIcon fontSize="large" />,
      description: `Get started by creating a detailed profile. Startups will showcase their business model, 
      team, traction, and funding needs. Investors will highlight their investment focus, 
      ticket size, and criteria.`,
      image: '/images/profile-creation.svg'
    },
    {
      label: 'Smart Matching Algorithm',
      icon: <SearchIcon fontSize="large" />,
      description: `Our AI-powered algorithm analyzes profiles to connect startups with 
      the most compatible investors. Match scores indicate potential fit based on industry, 
      investment stage, funding needs, and other criteria.`,
      image: '/images/matching-algorithm.svg'
    },
    {
      label: 'Secure Communication',
      icon: <ChatIcon fontSize="large" />,
      description: `Connect with your matches through our secure messaging system. 
      Share pitch decks, financial data, and other materials with potential partners 
      in a safe environment.`,
      image: '/images/secure-communication.svg'
    },
    {
      label: 'Close the Deal',
      icon: <HandshakeIcon fontSize="large" />,
      description: `When both parties are ready to move forward, our platform facilitates 
      the next steps. Track deal progress, manage terms, and close funding rounds—all within 
      the Questomer ecosystem.`,
      image: '/images/close-deal.svg'
    }
  ];

  return (
    <Box>
      {/* Header */}
      <AppBar position="static" color="transparent" elevation={0}>
        <Toolbar>
          <Typography variant="h6" component="div" sx={{ flexGrow: 1, fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
            Questomer
          </Typography>
          <Stack direction="row" spacing={2}>
            <Button component={Link} to="/login" variant="text">Login</Button>
            <Button component={Link} to="/register" variant="contained" color="primary">Sign Up</Button>
          </Stack>
        </Toolbar>
      </AppBar>

      {/* Hero Section */}
      <GradientHeader>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Box sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
            <Button 
              component={Link} 
              to="/"
              startIcon={<ArrowBackIcon />}
              sx={{ color: 'white' }}
            >
              Back to Home
            </Button>
          </Box>
          <Typography variant="h2" component="h1" gutterBottom>
            How It Works
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h5" paragraph>
            The Questomer platform connects startups with investors through a streamlined, data-driven process.
          </Typography>
        </Container>
      </GradientHeader>

      <Container maxWidth="md" sx={{ mb: 8 }}>
        <Box sx={{ maxWidth: 800, margin: '0 auto' }}>
          {steps.map((step, index) => (
            <Paper 
              key={index} 
              elevation={2} 
              sx={{ 
                p: 4, 
                mb: 4, 
                borderRadius: 2,
                transition: 'transform 0.3s ease-in-out',
                '&:hover': {
                  transform: 'translateY(-5px)',
                }
              }}
            >
              <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: { xs: 'column', sm: 'row' }, alignItems: 'center' }}>
                <Box sx={{ mr: { xs: 0, sm: 4 }, mb: { xs: 2, sm: 0 }, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center' }}>
                  <StepIcon>
                    {step.icon}
                  </StepIcon>
                  <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center' }}>
                    Step {index + 1}
                  </Typography>
                </Box>
                <Box>
                  <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
                    {step.label}
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body1" color="textSecondary">
                    {step.description}
                  </Typography>
                </Box>
              </Box>
            </Paper>
          ))}
        </Box>

        <Box sx={{ mt: 8, textAlign: 'center' }}>
          <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
            Ready to Get Started?
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="body1" paragraph color="textSecondary">
            Join thousands of startups and investors on Questomer today.
          </Typography>
          <Stack 
            direction={{ xs: 'column', sm: 'row' }}
            spacing={2}
            justifyContent="center"
            sx={{ mt: 4 }}
          >
            <Button 
              component={Link} 
              to="/register?role=startup" 
              variant="contained" 
              color="primary" 
              size="large"
            >
              Register as Startup
            </Button>
            <Button 
              component={Link} 
              to="/register?role=investor" 
              variant="outlined" 
              color="primary" 
              size="large"
            >
              Register as Investor
            </Button>
          </Stack>
        </Box>
      </Container>

      {/* Footer */}
      <Divider />
      <Box component="footer" sx={{ bgcolor: 'grey.100', py: 6 }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Typography variant="body2" color="textSecondary" align="center">
            © {new Date().getFullYear()} Questomer. All rights reserved.
          </Typography>
        </Container>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default HowItWorks;
